My scanner sucks at back scans of cards in new psa holders. I can email or text additional pics of the backs with my phone if desired.  Also have 8 presentable T212 Obaks available (scans in another Net 54 b/s/t thread).

Cards I am interested in trading for (I can also put cash into the deal):
T206 Lajoie (portrait or with bat)
T206 Evers portrait
T206 Young portrait
1954 Topps Aaron RC
1951 Bowman Mays RC
1949 Bowman Satchel Paige


Thanks for looking,
